Insured: MICHEL ALEXANDRE ANTHONY CHALHOUB

Claim Ref: DXB-PAR-2024-07-000141

 

 

Dear Hagop,

 

Have received the below findings from the attending Adjuster which is produced for your ready reference. Kindly provide us the invoice/proof of payment in order to conclude the matter.

 

QUOTE 

 

Based on our survey attendance, we observed water damage to approximately 55 metres of wall skirting and wall painting in isolated areas of the Insured’s villa.

 

From our assessment and further discussions with another reputable contractor in Dubai, we understand that the repair estimate provided is grossly excessive.

 

Therefore, based on the actual extent of the damage and the prevailing market rates, please find below a reasonable claim adjustment figure for your reference:

 

Removing and refixing of wooden wall skirting: AED 7,000

Repainting of affected walls with Fenomastic emulsion paint: AED 9,500

Total: AED 16,500

 

The Policy carries a deductible of AED 1,500 per loss.

 

Accordingly, the reasonable net claim amount for the Insurers' consideration would be AED 15,000.

 

UNQUOTE

 

 

 

 

Thanks and regards

 

 

Anila Varghese

Senior Assistant Manager – General Claims 

 



 

Al Ittihad Al Watani Insurance Co. 
For Nasco Gulf Insurance Agency LLC

Al Durrah Bldg.4 – Garhoud, Mezzanine Floor, P.O. Box 3000, Dubai, UAE

T +971 4 210 6800 Ext: 7660

Subject: Claim Intimation: Rain Damage (April 15-16) - Hadaeq Villa - Mrs. Edith Chalhoub

 

Dear Anila,

 

Hope this email finds you well.

 

This is to submit a claim intimation regarding damage sustained during the heavy rains of April 15-16. Please find attached the email from Mrs. Chalhoub detailing the incident, along with her relevant insurance policy.

 

Kindly assign a surveyor to this case and open a claim file for the incident.

 

Given Mrs. Edith's advanced age, we request that an in-person site visit be avoided. The contractor will be asked to provide any necessary photographs and documentation.

Dear Hagop,

 

Have received the below findings from the attending Adjuster which is produced for your ready reference. Kindly provide us the invoice/proof of payment in order to conclude the matter.

 

QUOTE 

 

Based on our survey attendance, we observed water damage to approximately 55 metres of wall skirting and wall painting in isolated areas of the Insured’s villa.

 

From our assessment and further discussions with another reputable contractor in Dubai, we understand that the repair estimate provided is grossly excessive.

 

Therefore, based on the actual extent of the damage and the prevailing market rates, please find below a reasonable claim adjustment figure for your reference:

 

Removing and refixing of wooden wall skirting: AED 7,000

Repainting of affected walls with Fenomastic emulsion paint: AED 9,500

Total: AED 16,500

 

The Policy carries a deductible of AED 1,500 per loss.

 

Accordingly, the reasonable net claim amount for the Insurers' consideration would be AED 15,000.

 

UNQUOTE

 

 

 

 

Thanks and regards

 

 

Anila Varghese

Senior Assistant Manager – General Claims
